tasks.task: Prepare and maintain apple trees through pruning.
subtasks: Identify dormant buds on apple trees.
Prune to shape central leader, removing excessive branches.
Maintain even spacing and orientation of fruiting branches.
Address competing branches for optimal light distribution.
Remove unnecessary branches to promote apical dominance competition.
Adjust tree height by selectively pruning branches.
Foster natural-looking tree structure through modified central leader technique.
Document pruning process for educational purposes.
